definition.name: geometric_fixed_points
definition.definition: For H <= G and G-spectrum X, the geometric fixed points Phi^H(X) is defined as the H-fixed points of (tilde{E}F[H] smash X), where F[H] is the family of proper subgroups of H. Key properties: Phi^H is exact, symmetric monoidal, Phi^H(S^V) = S^{V^H}. In particular Phi^H(S^{m*rho_H}) = S^m.
